hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of time.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Bow#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path of #Skulls#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Market#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #5# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Wallet# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #1# major item.

HC (Rock Wall).text: Medigoron sells the earliest Breath of the Wild demo.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Ganondorf doesn't specialize in hiding items, nor in keeping secrets for that matter.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Strength Upgrade#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say only one heart piece in all of Hyrule will declare the holder a winner.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #3# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #under the icy waters# lies #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Strength Upgrade#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Lens of Truth# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Dodongo's Cavern#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #spider behind a muddy wall# in a grotto holds #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Bombs (20 pieces)# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Right Bottom Fake Wall Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #the Bolero of Fire# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Magic Meter#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Like Like Chest

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Shadow Temple#.
